name: Database Performance Optimization
description: Collaborative database optimization focusing on performance, data integrity, and business logic validation

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Please conduct a comprehensive database optimization audit:
1. Analyze current index usage and effectiveness
2. Review query performance patterns
3. Identify tables that need vacuuming or maintenance
4. Recommend specific optimization strategies for our largest tables (sessions, agent_conversations)
5. Propose index adjustments for imported_subscribers table which has high index-to-data ratio
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need to ensure our database is performing optimally. Current analysis shows potential optimization opportunities in index usage and table maintenance.
expectedDeliverables: Specific optimization actions for top 5 largest tables

workflowTemplate.name: Database Performance Optimization
workflowTemplate.description: Collaborative database optimization focusing on performance, data integrity, and business logic validation

agents.taskDescription: Comprehensive database performance analysis and optimization
Business logic validation and data flow analysis

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
- Wait for zara to complete before starting victoria task
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
victoria provides: Data flow optimization recommendations
